title: Had my last 20 min leaverbust, and waited 80 minutes (including leaverbust)
body: I had my last leaverbust to get rid of so I can play with my friends, I waited more than an hour on poroking and cannot find a game, is it possible to change my game mode or somehow compensate this? As I had waited for the time worth 4 leaverbusts and I wouldn't want to waste the time I wasted waiting for this game ;( The game then quit on me itself please help!

replies.body: Oh SNAP that would really suck to have waited 80 minutes for Poro King. It's pretty strange that you had to wait that long, as Poro King is a pretty happening place right now, most people get their queues in less than a minute. If you happened to grab a screenshot of that absurdly long queue timer, shoot that my way and I might be able to help out.
It suddenly quit on me when it reached 80 minutes, didn't have time to screenshot ;( hoping if you guys record the queue timer on each account...
